Action.author: guoger
Action.body: ~tatsu-sato we still have passthru chaincode in core/chaincode/testdata/src/chaincodes/passthru, welcome to re-submit patch via GitHub PR

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Closed due to CR abandoned. ~guoger do you see value in such unit tests?

Action.author: guoger
Action.body: ~denyeart we have UT for other examples there. IMHO, by utilizing those examples in our test, it's already being unit-tested somehow, so i'm good with closing this
